data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal.
In the minute 2, Free kick Villarreal.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards Atletico a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
In the minute 8, Atletico attack but Stefan Savic's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Wanda Metropolitano.
Atletico's Luis Suarez breaks free at Wanda Metropolitano. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
Atletico drive upfield and Luis Suarez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Villarreal defender.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Atletico have a goal kick.
Villarreal's Mario Gaspar is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Villarreal at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 24, Thomas Partey of Atletico gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 25, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Can Atletico capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Villarreal's half?
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
In Madrid Atletico's Joao Felix is caught offside.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
Throw-in Villarreal.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Atletico in the half of Villarreal.
Thomas Partey (Atletico) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
In the minute 38, Atletico have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a Atletico throw-in in Villarreal's half.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Villarreal's Mario Gaspar misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Villarreal.
Throw-in for Villarreal close to the penalty box.
Villarreal have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 50, Villarreal's Mario Gaspar gets in a shot on goal at Wanda Metropolitano. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Raul Albiol is booked for the away team.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Atletico to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Goal kick for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 56, In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Atletico's Renan Lodi has been booked in Madrid.
In the minute 57, Throw-in high up the field for Atletico in Madrid.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
In the minute 59, Atletico's Renan Lodi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Atletico needs to be cautious. Villarreal have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 62, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a throw-in for Atletico, close to Villarreal's area.
Atletico pushes forward through Renan Lodi, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Madrid Villarreal attack through Manu Trigueros. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 64, Atletico have a goal kick.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
Villarreal to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
In the minute 68, Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Diego Costa is replacing Luis Suarez for the home team.
Diego Simeone is making the team's second substitution at Wanda Metropolitano with Yannick Carrasco replacing Koke.
In the minute 70, Marcos Llorente is replacing Angel Correa for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
Can Villarreal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico's half?
Samuel Chukwueze is on a sub for Paco Alcacer for Villarreal.
In the minute 73, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Marcos Llorente (Atletico) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 74, Atletico drive forward but Saul Niguez is judged offside.
Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Atletico.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, Diego Simeone (Atletico) is making a fourth substitution, with Hector Herrera replacing Joao Felix.
Throw-in for Villarreal at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a Villarreal throw-in in Atletico's half.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Vicente Iborra (Villarreal) gets a yellow card.
Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
In the minute 81, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
Atletico's Thomas Partey gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Villarreal defender.
In the minute 83, Atletico drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 85, The away team have replaced Manu Trigueros with Takefusa Kubo. This is the second substitution made today by Unai Emery.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
Villarreal to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
Villarreal are pushing forward but Gerard Moreno's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
At Wanda Metropolitano the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Madrid, Marcos Llorente of Atletico is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a Atletico throw-in in Villarreal's half.
Atletico push upfield but Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez quickly pulls them for offside.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
